ABOUT THIS RESTAURANT

Located in North Charleston, we serve only the highest quality craveable chicken finger meals. It's our ONE LOVE. Our crew makes it happen, our culture makes it unique, and the community makes it all worthwhile.

We're Hiring

Work with cool people, get great benefits and find your path.

You can get a paycheck anywhere, but at Raising Cane's you'll get career training, recognition and rewards. Have fun on your path to success - it all begins here.
